document.text:
From: "Weingarten, Reid"  
To:' 
Subject: Re: U.S. v. Epstein, 19 Cr. 490 
Date: Mon, 08 Jul 2019 10:00:37 +0000 
Thanks see you in the morning 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Jul 7, 2019, at  11:16 PM, 
C 
wrote: 
Reid, 
I understand you'll also be appearing for Mr. Epstein tomorrow, so I wanted to send the full contact information for our 
team, as we did previously for Marty. As the case goes forward, please feel free to reach out to any of us at the below 
contacts, and we'll see you in the morning. 
(office) 
(cell) 
(office) 
(cell) 
(office) 
(cell) 
thanks, 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00030168
